titles.title: Disabled and Blind Homeowners Home Equity Conversion Mortgage Act
To amend section 255 of the National Housing Act to make homeowners who are at least 50 years of age and disabled or blind eligible for home equity conversion mortgages insured under such section.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Community Development.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E54-55)

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 11/19/1993--Introduced. Disabled and Blind Homeowners Home Equity Conversion Mortgage Act - Amends the National Housing Act to make homeowners who are at least 50 years old and disabled or blind eligible for insured home equity conversion mortgages.
